## Face.interval() method

This method is called with every timer interval. The purpose of method is to return a new value. Each time the value changes, the clock is be re-rendered.

**Signature:**

```typescript
interval(instance: FlipClock<T>): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  instance | [FlipClock](./flipclock.flipclock.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt; |  |

**Returns:**

void
